feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain early in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
